2025-03-06.title: Murphy Exclusive Weapon
2025-03-06.description: Murphy's Exclusive Weapon available, turning your hero into the ultimate guardian for your troops with a powerful boost!

2025-03-20.title: Carlie Exclusive Weapon
2025-03-20.description: Carlie's Exclusive Weapon available. The skilled guardian will protect your troops, providing your hero with a significant boost!

2025-04-10.title: Swift Exclusive Weapon
2025-04-10.description: Swift's Exclusive Weapon available. This is an intense firepower party, where your hero will receive a massive boost!

2025-04-28.title: Age Of Oil
2025-04-28.description: Fresh energy fuels groundbreaking technology, setting the stage for your base's next big evolution!.

2025-04-28.title: Tempest Beast
2025-04-28.description: Tempest Beast unlocks. Kill the Zombie Boss and awaken Glacieradon, the beast lurking beneath the icy surface! Rally your allies for an epic battle!

2025-04-28.title: General's Trial
2025-04-28.description: In General's Trial, advanced difficulty unlocks. Take on greater challenges, defeat formidable enemies, and earn universal exclusive weapons!

2025-06-02.title: Doomsday
2025-06-02.description: The infected former baseball legend is causing chaos!

2025-06-06.title: Overlord available
2025-06-06.description: Rescue the Gorilla Overlord to gain a powerful battlefield ally--make your enemies tremble in fear!
